basics.name: Weiqin Yang
basics.label: AI/ML Researcher
basics.summary: A CS Master student in Zhejiang University, China, researching on recommender systems

awards.title: National Scholarship
awards.awarder: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China
awards.summary: The National Scholarship is the highest award for Chinese students in China, which is awarded by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

awards.title: Honors Bachelor Degree of Shandong University
awards.summary: The Honors Bachelor Degree of Shandong University is awarded to students who have excellent academic performance and outstanding comprehensive quality (GPA Top 5% and all courses above 85, or published first-author SCI papers).

awards.title: Outstanding Graduate of Shandong University
awards.summary: The Outstanding Graduate of Shandong University is awarded to excellent graduates who have made outstanding achievements in various fields.

awards.title: Outstanding Undergraduate Thesis of Shandong University
awards.summary: The Outstanding Undergraduate Thesis of Shandong University is awarded to students who have written excellent undergraduate theses (Top 3%).

awards.title: Outstanding Youth League Member of Shandong University
awards.summary: The Outstanding Youth League Member of Shandong University is awarded to the youth league members who have made outstanding contributions to the university.

awards.title: Star of Self-improvement Nomination Award of Shandong University
awards.summary: The Star of Self-improvement Nomination Award of Shandong University is awarded to students who have a strong sense of self-improvement and have made outstanding achievements that distinguish them from others.

awards.title: First-class Academic Scholarship of Shandong University
awards.summary: The First-class Academic Scholarship of Shandong University is awarded to students who have excellent academic performance (GPA Top 5%) in the previous academic year.

awards.title: Huawei Scholarship
awards.summary: The Huawei Scholarship is awarded to students who have excellent performance in the previous academic year, and actively participate in projects and competitions organized by Huawei.

awards.title: Zhiyang Scholarship
awards.summary: The Zhiyang Scholarship is awarded to students who have excellent academic performance in Computer Elite Class, School of Computer Science and Technology, Shandong University.

awards.title: Merit Student of Shandong University
awards.summary: The Merit Student of Shandong University is awarded to students who have excellent academic performance, outstanding comprehensive quality, and good moral character.

awards.title: First-class Scholarship for Research and Innovation of Shandong University
awards.summary: The First-class Scholarship for Research and Innovation of Shandong University is awarded to students who have made outstanding achievements in scientific research and competitions in the previous academic year.

awards.title: Weichai Power Scholarship
awards.summary: The Weichai Power Scholarship is awarded to students who have excellent performance in the previous academic year, but not awarded the National Scholarship.

competitions.title: The 6th Alibaba Global Mathematics Competition: Finalist #54
competitions.summary: The Alibaba Global Mathematics Competition is a global mathematics competition organized by DAMO Academy, Alibaba Group. The competition is open to all college students around the world. There are 802 finalists in 2024.

competitions.title: The 5th Alibaba Global Mathematics Competition: Finalist #198
competitions.summary: The Alibaba Global Mathematics Competition is a global mathematics competition organized by DAMO Academy, Alibaba Group. The competition is open to all college students around the world. There are 685 finalists in 2023.

competitions.title: COMAP's 2023 Mathematical Contest in Modeling: Finalist Winner
competitions.awarder: Consortium for Mathematics and its Applications (COMAP)
competitions.summary: The Mathematical Contest in Modeling (MCM), also known as the American Mathematical Contest in Modeling, is a famous international mathematical modeling competition for college students. The Finalists are Top 2% winners.

competitions.title: The 4th Alibaba Global Mathematics Competition: Finalist #477
competitions.summary: The Alibaba Global Mathematics Competition is a global mathematics competition organized by DAMO Academy, Alibaba Group. The competition is open to all college students around the world. There are 715 finalists in 2022.

competitions.title: The 14th Chinese Mathematics Competitions (Math Major A Group): First Prize
competitions.summary: The Chinese Mathematics Competitions (CMC) is a national mathematics competition for college students in China, which is organized by the Chinese Mathematical Society. The Math Major A Group is for students who are majoring in mathematics.

competitions.title: The 13th Chinese Mathematics Competitions (Non-math Major Group): First Prize
competitions.summary: The Chinese Mathematics Competitions (CMC) is a national mathematics competition for college students in China, which is organized by the Chinese Mathematical Society. The Non-math Major Group is for students who are not majoring in mathematics.

competitions.title: The 12th Chinese Mathematics Competitions (Non-math Major Group): First Prize
competitions.summary: The Chinese Mathematics Competitions (CMC) is a national mathematics competition for college students in China, which is organized by the Chinese Mathematical Society. The Non-math Major Group is for students who are not majoring in mathematics.
